Text: Thank you so much. I just finished downloading it and went through a few pages and it looks amazing! I wanted to ask you if you can upload a PDF of the strategy guide. I've been looking for Guide everywhere and It sold out. I will be seeding this torrent for a while.

I have the physical players guide, but to properly scan it I would need to cut the binding off of it. I don't have a band saw, and don't want to destroy my only copy of the guide. I'm sure it will come back in stock at Amazon soon, and I highly recommend purchasing it if you have the means - it's an amazing book.

Saw that binding to pieces! It would be awesome to have a pdf of the players guide. They don't sell the pdf version do they? I would definitely buy it online if I could find it. Anyway, thank you so much for the Wizard's Companion. Will be seeding.
trying to dl to kindle fire hd but not working
Thx for this but anybody have french version plz ?
How did you generate this? I know not many games have in-game manuals, but even so this seems like a valuable skill.

This was generated by extracting the images from the game disc using various tools and scripts. After the images were extracted, they were chopped in half and combined into a PDF and then TOC and hyperlinks were added by hand.
